text: Milton Hershey School in Hershey, Pennsylvania is hiring married couples to become houseparents.
speaker: SPEAKER_17

text: MHS is one of the world's best private schools, where students in pre-K through 12th grade live on campus and receive an exceptional education with all costs covered.
speaker: SPEAKER_17

text: Houseparents are an important part of our mission to create life-changing opportunities for students from disadvantaged backgrounds.
speaker: SPEAKER_17

text: In this role, you and your spouse will work together to create a nurturing environment for the group of students in your care.
speaker: SPEAKER_17

text: You will care for their daily needs while providing mentorship and teaching valuable life skills.
speaker: SPEAKER_17

text: While it's important you feel called to this role, it's not a volunteer position.
speaker: SPEAKER_17

text: This is an opportunity to find your purpose as a difference maker while living rent-free and earning an income with comprehensive benefits.
speaker: SPEAKER_17

text: You'll be part of a community of over 200 houseparent couples and an even larger MHS support system, all united by the goal of helping children become the best versions of themselves.
speaker: SPEAKER_17

text: If you're a married couple looking to discover your next chapter, visit mhskids.org slash discover to learn more.

text: August 7th is National Purple Heart Day, which recognizes those who have been wounded or killed in action while defending the United States.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: George Washington created the Purple Heart on August 7th, 1782.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: It was first known as the Badge of Military Merit, but it was not a regular honor until it was revived on Washington's 200th birthday in 1932, when it was made retroactive, meaning soldiers from World War I could be honored.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: The first such medal was given to General Douglas MacArthur.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: In 1942, Congress changed the parameters for the Purple Heart
speaker: SPEAKER_02
